content: तत्र {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} In that place, there, yonder, thither. {@--2@} On that occasion, under those circumstances, then, in that case. {@--3@} For that, in that; निरीतयः . यन्मदीयाः प्रजास्तत्र हेतुस्त्वद्ब्रह्मवर्चसं <ls>R. 1. 63.</ls> {@--4@} Often used for the <ab>loc.</ab> case of तद्; <ls>Ms. 2. 112</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 60</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 186</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 263.</ls> तत्रापि ‘even then’ ‘nevertheless’; (corr. of यद्यपि.). तत्र तत्र ‘in various places or cases, ‘here and there,’ ‘to every place’; अध्यक्षान्विविधान्कुर्यात तत्र तत्र विपश्चितः <ls>Ms. 7. 81.</ls>
